pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, August 22, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Chancellor of Germany, Olaf Scholz. Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland, Minister of Foreign Affairs Mélanie Joly, Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry François-Philippe Champagne, and Minister of Natural Resources Jonathan Wilkinson will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Chancellor of Germany, Olaf Scholz.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:30 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

1:55 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit an artificial intelligence research centre with the Chancellor of Germany, Olaf Scholz. Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry François-Philippe Champagne and Minister of Natural Resources Jonathan Wilkinson will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

Toronto, Ontario

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will host an official dinner for the Chancellor of Germany, Olaf Scholz.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 6:30 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
